title: Things I'm missing in the alpha client
body:
* When friends are in game, you don't see whether they play normals or ranked
* You can't see which champions you already got chests for
* You don't see when your next chest becomes available / how many there are available right now
* You don't see when/if your first win of the day is available

1. I don't have an answer right now, my guess is that we already have people working on it.
2. The fix went in this week, should be available with the next patch.
3. I reported this bug a couples of weeks ago too. There is people currently working on adding this.
4. You can see that in the profile page. Under your summoner name there is a sword icon that you can hover over.

Would it be possible to make the first win marker give a countdown in seconds and minutes like the current client, and not just in hours? Not a huge deal of course, but having the exact time available would be useful to some players with busy schedules or who play at very inconsistent times of the day.
My biggest complain is not being able to tell the difference between wheter or not my friends are in customs, normals, or ranked. pls fix
